General.Name: Aurinia Pharmaceuticals Inc
General.Description: Aurinia Pharmaceuticals Inc., a commercial-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on developing and commercializing therapies to treat various diseases with unmet medical need in the United States. The company also offers LUPKYNIS for the treatment of adult patients with active lupus nephritis. It has a collaboration and license agreement with Otsuka Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. Aurinia Pharmaceuticals Inc. is headquartered in Victoria, Canada.
General.Address: 4464 Markham Street, Victoria, BC, Canada, V8Z 7X8

3.Name: Mr. Stephen P. Robertson
3.Title: Exec. VP, Gen. Counsel, Corp. Sec. & Chief Compliance Officer
